Module PandemicSimulation
Package com.devandrepascoa.main

Class PandemicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devandrepascoa.main.PandemicController
  • public class PandemicController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller for the pandemic.fxml file, used for controlling the fxml "View", based on the Model-View-Controller design pattern
